about_the_game:
Looking for a fun and exciting party game to play with your friends? Look no further than BoostHead! This fast-paced brawler game is all about challenging your friends to see who's the best, with no story to get in the way of the action.

In BoostHead, up to four players can battle it out in a variety of challenging arenas, using a range of special moves and power-ups to gain the upper hand. Whether you're knocking your opponents off the edge of the screen or smashing them with a power-up, there's always something new and exciting happening in BoostHead.

With its intuitive controls and addictive gameplay, BoostHead is the perfect party game for players of all skill levels. Whether you're a seasoned brawler or a newbie just looking to have some fun, BoostHead has something for everyone.

So what are you waiting for? Grab your controllers and get ready to brawl with BoostHead! With its non-stop action and endless variety, this ultimate party game is sure to keep you and your friends entertained for hours on end.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Monterey
  • Processor: Intel or M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible GPU
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: BoostHead

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: BoostHead is a party brawler for up to four players. Battle it out in arenas using special moves and power-ups. BoostHead is perfect for players of all skill levels and is the ultimate party game for those seeking a fun and exciting experience with friends.
